name: Avoid Red [Updated]
description:
My first game so please be indulgent. It's an open beta because I want to know what you guys would like to add to the game! My 2 first Gamemodes are available!!! YEAH!! More will come soon!

I have to add/change:
-the gameover screen (any ideas?)
-more and more gamemodes:
 -SPIKE [Done]
- COLOR POP [Done]

- social links
-Add better sounds and maybe some music (links are appreciated in the comment section)

-better gameover menu score and highscore (I havent found a way for the highscore yet)

Contructive comments please! :D
